channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Mike Flanagan Has His Next Stephen King Adaptation: ‘The Mist’
item.description: Yes, there was already a movie and a show, but now we're getting a new take on the story.

item.title: This Itch.io bundle to help Minnesota includes over 1,200 games and costs just $10
item.description:
You have likely heard about the masked agents of ICE mucking around in Minnesota for the past few months, resulting in numerous violent incidents and deaths. Itch.io is hosting a bundle to help raise money for the Immigrant Law Center of Minnesota, which was organized by charity creator Jes Wade. The No ICE in Minnesota bundle includes nearly 1,300 video games and tabletop games and costs just $10, though those with deep pockets can certainly donate more than that. It has a goal of $100,000, which it certainly is on pace to meet.
There are some nifty titles here, particularly for those intere...

item.title: I made the switch to 4K Blu-ray and have never looked back — these are the discs I'd recommend above all others
item.description: These six 4K UHD Blu-ray discs will make excellent additions to anyone's collection – whether you're new to the format or not.

item.title: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick admits to meeting Epstein, reversing previous claims
item.description: Lutnick is the highest-profile U.S. official to face bipartisan calls for his resignation amid revelations of his ties to Epstein. Under questioning from Democrats Tuesday, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick acknowledged that he had met with Jeffrey Epstein twice after his 2008 conviction for soliciting prostitution from a child, reversing Lutnick’s previous claim that he had cut ties with the late financier after 2005....

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried wants a re-trial for fraud charges
item.description: Former cryptocurrency poster boy Sam Bankman-Fried is trying to get another chance in court. He has filed a request that for a new trial on claims that new witness testimony could alter the case made against him by prosecutors, according to Bloomberg. His odds for getting the re-trial, where he'd be representing himself, seem pretty slim. This is a separate motion from a formal appeal of his previous conviction.Bankman-Fried is one of many cryptocurrency leaders who have since been prosecuted for fraud. After being jailed for witness tampering, he was found guilty of seven charges of fraud and...

item.title: La Russie annonce des restrictions sur Telegram pour « violation » de la loi
item.description: Le fondateur de l’application Telegram a dénoncé mardi les restrictions annoncées par les autorités russes sur la messagerie, y voyant une atteinte à la « liberté des citoyens » et une tentative de forcer les Russes à migrer vers une messagerie locale plus facile à contrôler.

item.title: The type of coffee you drink may matter more for your brain than how much
item.description: A 43-year study of 131,000 people found caffeinated coffee was linked to lower dementia risk, while decaf showed no benefit. Don’t feel bad splurging on that $7 latte the next time you’re in a mid-afternoon attention slump.

item.title: 'Extremely comfortable': Steelcase Leap - the gold-standard of office chairs - gets a rare price-cut in the Better Together sale
item.description: The Steelcase Leap is one of the best for long hours at your desk, and right now there's 20% off.

item.title: Sharge’s new power bank can charge two laptops while putting on a light show
item.description: Sharge has made a name for itself amongst the tech-obsessed with chargers and power banks featuring eye-catching designs and extra functionality. Power bank feature creep is more often than not a bad thing, but Sharge is unabashedly leaning into the trend with its new Shargeek 300. We first went hands on with it over a […]

item.title: Les nombreuses qualités du Honor 400 sont à retrouver à moitié prix grâce à cette offre
item.description: De ses nombreuses fonctionnalités liées à l'intelligence artificielle à sa batterie de 5 300 mAh en passant par son écran Amoled de 6,55 pouces, les qualités du Honor 400 sont nombreuses. Chez AliExpress, il voit son prix être quasiment divisé par deux et il tombe à 261,26 euros au lieu de 499 euros.

item.title: This GoPro and Lens Bundle Is $200 Off
item.description: You can grab a fully kitted action camera and all the lenses for $550.

item.title: I've found the perfect new ergonomic chair for your office: SIHOO Doro C300 provides all-day comfort and it’s $300 right now
item.description: SIHOO’s Doro C300 has the key features I look for in an ergonomic chair, including a self-adaptive lumbar system.

item.title: Facebook can animate your profile pic with AI
item.description: Facebook is rolling out new AI features that let you animate your profile picture and restyle Stories and Memories. You'll also be able to add animated backgrounds to text posts to make them pop in the feed. With the animated profile pictures, you'll be able to give a still photo motion with some preset types […]

item.title: How sanctions are stifling Russia’s oil exports
item.description: To pressure the Kremlin to halt fighting in Ukraine, the Trump administration imposed sanctions on Russia’s two largest oil companies. Oil and gas exports have sustained Russia’s finances throughout its war against Ukraine. But as the fourth anniversary of the full-scale invasion approaches, those cash flows have suddenly dwindled to lows not seen in years....

item.title: Books, movies, and games are buy one, get one 50% off at Target
item.description: Target is holding a buy one, get one 50% off books, movies, and games sale for Circle members through Feb. 14.

item.title: ‘Ello Luv, Elsa Bloodstone Joins ‘Marvel Rivals’ This Week
item.description: A new month means a new 'Marvel Rivals' hero, and Season 6.5 brings about the monster hunter Elsa Bloodstone.

item.title: Microsoft researchers crack AI guardrails with a single prompt
item.description: A single prompt can shift a model's safety behavior, with ongoing prompts potentially fully eroding it.

item.title: If You Want To Keep Using Your HomePod, Update It Now
item.description: This forced update may be the first sign we'll finally see a new HomePod, or 'HomePad.'

item.title: What a deal! Save $745 on the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i creative powerhouse with Core Ultra 9 and RTX 5070
item.description: Lenovo’s Legion Pro 5i flagship laptop, with a Core Ultra 9, RTX 5070, 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD, and OLED display, is now $1960, a $745 saving.

item.title: Pourquoi le Rivian R2 est la voiture électrique le plus importante de 2026
item.description: Le moment de vérité approche pour Rivian. La marque californienne vient de confirmer que tous les détails du R2, son SUV à 45 000 dollars, seront révélés le 12 mars. C'est la voiture qui doit transformer l'artisan du luxe en géant mondial, tout en sauvant indirectement Volkswagen.

item.title: Hubble showcases the Egg Nebula in all its dying-star glory
item.description: Hubble may no longer be the gold standard, but it can still capture some impressive images. The telescope's latest snapshot is our clearest view yet of the Egg Nebula. Roughly 3,000 light-years away from Earth, the nebula's name is derived from its dense layer of gas and dust cloaking a central star.The new image shows the nebula's four beams of starlight (from that central star) escaping from its gas-and-dust "shell." On either side of the disc-like cloud are fast-moving outflows of hot molecular hydrogen. The orange highlights in this image indicate the glow of infrared light.As the beams of...

item.title: TikToks Boy Kibble trend, explained
item.description: The 'Boy Kibble' trend rebrands Gym Bro food as a new thing.

item.title: Someone has just invented the dream lossless Dolby Atmos music service for audiophiles — but it needs some changes before it's likely to really take off
item.description: Grammy-nominated musician and producer Steven Wilson has launched his own high-tech audio platform, for the audiophiles out there.

item.title: Samsung Odyssey G6 à 500 Hz : ce moniteur QD-OLED ultime pour l’e-sport devient un peu plus accessible après 100 € de remise
item.description: Pensé pour l’e-sport et les gamers exigeants en quête d’une réactivité sans faille, le Samsung Odyssey G6 G60SF impressionne avec sa dalle QD-OLED capable d’atteindre un taux de rafraîchissement record de 500 Hz. Une bête de vitesse qui devient encore plus tentante grâce à une réduction de 100 euros.

item.title: Stay juiced up anywhere with 25% off the Anker Prime Power Bank
item.description: As of Feb. 10, get 25% off the Anker Prime Power Bank at Amazon.

item.title: AI activation will define 2026
item.description: This year marks the shift from AI experimentation to mainstream adoption and ROI.

item.title: Grab the Blueair ComfortPure 3-in-1 air purifier while its $320 — be ready for pollen season this year
item.description: The Blueair ComfortPure 3-in-1 air purifier is on sale at Woot for $179.99, down from the list price of $499.99. That's a 64% discount.

item.title: Institutions are drowning in AI-generated text and they can’t keep up
item.description: Yet some of these AI arms races have surprising hidden upsides. In 2023, the science fiction literary magazine Clarkesworld stopped accepting new submissions because so many were generated by artificial intelligence. Near as the editors could tell, many submitters pasted the magazine’s detailed story guidelines into an AI and sent in the results. And they weren’t alone. Other fiction magazines have also reported a high number of AI-generated submissions....

item.title: Bad Bunnys halftime show sparked emotional reactions across the Americas. See the heartwarming videos now.
item.description: Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl Halftime Show sparked viral reactions, with Latin families sharing heartwarming videos online celebrating their home countries.

item.title: An Ark showed me augmented reality’s true artistic potential
item.description: A few weeks ago, I locked eyes with Sir Ian McKellen as he told me a story about how I was born, where I grew up, and when I would eventually die. Some of the details were a little off, but others were so unsettlingly on the money that it felt like he really did […]
